attributes.comment:
EB immigration is married to the job. That means, no promotion, no increase in
salary. Imagine this for over six to ten years or more. Trying to balance the family
budget and paying more and more fees for "immigration benefits," is a taxing
financially and mentally.

Also for EAD and AP we have to renew every year. So There is USCIS fee and
Attorney fee and mutliply this by an average family sixze of 3

With Visa dates for adjustments of status set in stone age for people born in India,
the proposed fees will effectively be a second mortgage payment.

I STRONGLY OPPOSE this fee increase.

If you do increase fee for EAD and AP, then you should increase the validity of
these documents
from one year to 5 years. it will save us mentla torture and hard earned money.

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Anonymous
